title: ESIC Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 35 Specialist and Other Posts
description: Employees' State Insurance Corporation (ESIC), Uttar Pradesh, has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up vacancies for 35 Specialist Specialist and Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MBBS, MD/ MS, Post-Graduation, and Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the ESIC Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligibl...
